QuestData.Title: Spirits of the Glen
QuestData.Description:
Animals of the forest, mortal souls given form, frolic in the glen. Their anima, a boon to the weald, given freely as rain on the leaves.
But danger lurks in the shadows. A dark storm of malice and enmity tears at the trees. Creatures seeking shelter find only peril.
Rescue them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Choofa in the Spirit Glen.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Choofa in the Spirit Glen.
QuestData.RewardText:
What's this? What's this?
The Tall Tree has sent you to help us? Help us!
